quote: Liberty will always triumph over fear and fundamentalism. Our desire to be free is greater than their desire to terrorise and our capacity to love far exceeds their capacity to hate.
quote_letters: LIBERTY WILL ALWAYS TRIUMPH OVER FEAR AND FUNDAMENTALISM OUR DESIRE TO BE FREE IS GREATER THAN THEIR DESIRE TO TERRORISE AND OUR CAPACITY TO LOVE FAR EXCEEDS THEIR CAPACITY TO HATE
